description: Tagliata with sweet potato wedges is a lighter way to enjoy steak and chips.
name: Beef Tagliata with Roasted Sweet Potato Wedges Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 large sweet potatoes, sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Toss the sweet potato wedges in a large bowl with a tablespoon of oil, rosemary and seasoning. Spread out in an even layer on a baking tray. Roast for 25 minutes, shake the tray and roast for 15 minutes until crisp.

Heat a griddle pan on the highest setting and leave until it is smoking hot. Brush the steaks with a tablespoon of oil, season and cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium, depending on thickness. Remove from the pan, wrap in foil and allow to rest.
In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining oil and balsamic vinegar, season with salt and cracked black pepper.

Arrange the rocket and cherry tomatoes on a serving platter. Thinly slice the steaks against the grain on place on top of the leaves. Using a vegetable peeler, shave the parmesan on top. Drizzle with the balsamic dressing.
Season with cracked black pepper and serve with the sweet potato wedges on the side.
